_comment: Simplified approach to find and use package.json

commands: test -f package.json && npm install --omit=dev || echo 'package.json not found in current directory'
test -f /app/package.json && cd /app && npm install --omit=dev || echo 'package.json not found in /app'

deploy.startCommand: test -f package.json && npm run start:production || (cd /app && npm run start:production)
